channel.title: 728 PrestigeScape | All Skills | Summoning | Webclient |New Updates Coming!
channel.description:
[center][size=12pt]~PrestigeScape 728~[/size] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/11k9ks2.png[/img]
DownLoad Links are below! Website: www.prestigescape.com WebClient: www.prestigescape.com/webclient.html Please note We still are under construction so please be patient with all updates -Thank you + New Content Everyday, We also take suggestions seriously if you would like to see anything on our server you open a poll or contact a Coder.
What we have to offer!
Features: - 24/7 VPS 8GB Hosted - V Bulletin Forums - No Lag - Stable Eco - Daily Challenges - Clue Scrolls - Donor Zone - Old and new Runescape Armor - Loyalty point system with shop - Various shops. - Dominion Tower - Lava Flow Mining - Jadinko Lair - Frost Dragons - Bork - Tormented Demons - New Godwars - Squeal of fortune. - Bone's on altar. - Hunter. - All the GodWars Dungeons. - Fully working Nex. - Curses, ancients etc. - Working Revenants. - Queen Black Dragon - Fight Kiln - Fight Caves - Custom Dung - Working chaotics - Working Flowers and Dicing - Warriors Guild - Random Events - Custom Home teles - Full abyss -And many much more! *Note we are still in development so please be patient with server updates!
~Media~
Full Screen/LD Webclient And Client
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/34eojnk.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/nzq7ac.png[/img]
<3 90% Working G.E *Minor bugs that need to be fixed please be patient with me <3

http://www.mediafire.com/?8zkjdv9v2gl7ivn
~~Uppit~~
http://uppit.com/jxm5piyxouaz/prestigescape.rar
Staff Owner - Khaos Co - Owner - Kyle Web Development Team - Jaded - Xorex Head Coder - Zero Head Mod - Rayn
[ol][li][size=10pt]<3 Server Start Up Challenge!~! <3[/size][/li] [li][/li][/ol]
OK so being the fact that all skills work on the server, I am programming(Putting together a server start up challenge) to encourage players to play hard and be respectful and you will be rewarded. *On that note*Players who succeed in all of the following will be rewarded with the completionis't cape, and any item of your choice. -Must have 99 in all skills of Coarse. -Must have Mined 5000 Gold ore. -Must have fished 5000 Rocktail. -Must have cut 5000 magic logs -Must have burned 5000 magic logs (Obtaining inferno adaze) -Must have completed 500 laps on the gnome agility course.[/center]

Looks like every other 700+

Well, Were Adding Alot Of Unseen Content On RSPS Such As Nazi Zombies (Like CoD).
And Working Pest Control Ect.
[/quote]
nazi zombies seen it many times
Pest control Meh I seen it atleast 7 times XD! so sorta unique[/quote]

No, Youve seen zombies minigame (jad with zombies) what im releasing is COMPLETELY custom.

item.title: 728 PrestigeScape | All Skills | Summoning | Webclient |New Updates Coming!
item.dc:creator: @Hevanlyarms Hevanlyarms
item.description:
@Hevanlyarms wrote:

New Updates That Are Coming!

Awesome Dzone! Custom Zombies Minigame! (Like Nazi Zombies) With Box That Gives You Random Weapons Which You Hit When Killing Zombies You Get Points.
Story Line With Epic Custom Cut Scenes. , Clue Scrolls , Quests.

Im Thinking About Membership? Not Expensive Like $2 A month? you get exclusive access to some zones and items.

Story Mode Where you have like 10 quests and at the end you get an amulet when you activate it you turn into a werewolf and your able to stay like that and a custom pvp where you can fight as werewolfs. you get + exp for example as a werewolf you have 120 att and 120 str (just an example).

also once we have a good 400 players adding working ge, selling and buying not default ge where you can buy anything that messes up the eco.

Exp Rates Are Going Lower As Default RSPS Has Fast Exp so you dont appreciate stuff like rune armor so eco is better and you enjoy your time and work hard for your level 99! and show off your capes and stats ect.

  • Much More Updates!!

If you have any suggestions? id love to hear it if there good ill be more than happy to add it so you can enjoy your time here at prestigescape.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

[quote=“lokemper, post:7, topic:508938”][quote author=nolan2131 link=topic=627177.msg4262734#msg4262734 date=1363617663]
Looks like every other 700+
[/quote]
well thats to you people who dont even try the server out …[/quote]

Are you daft? There is a reason for not trying it out; which is that it “Looks like every other 700+” Sure if it was unique I would try it out, but there are 20 700+ revised servers that I could find in 5 minutes with everything this one has. I can’t try them all, especially the ones that don’t look unique.

Read full topic
